fields.headline: The measure
fields.bodyText: Going up Mustard It flatters absolutely no one but, thanks to Chloé, it is turning into the colour of the summer. And it goes very nicely with our barbecued sausages Burlesque clothes A bit of a cliché? Yes. But it's Modern Times tonight, babycakes, and that excuses our feathered headdress one last time 80s bootlegs A bit of a cliché? Yes, part II. But hot damn, they're a good way to finish a springtime party Mini trenches We give up on this trapeze malarky and are rechannelling last year's Lou Doillon French vibe 'Farmer's' hair We refer you to Sarah Beeny and Kate 'Animal Park' Humble. Bad, but, strangely, we love it anyway Wide velvet straps As seen atop Prada cashmere jumpers and beaded dresses. Sounds wrong, but is so very right M&S knickers Honestly, have you seen their lacy boyshorts? Or their cotton ones? Or their price tags? Gawd bless you, M&S, each and every one Going down Lanvin's Arpège The lovely bottle doesn't disguise the old lady smell. Dear Alber, please could you make your perfume as perfect as your clothes? Thank you Rochas' Poupée See above, substituting 'Olivier Theyskens' for 'Alber Elbaz'. Ta Summer holiday smugness Booked your villa? Sorted your retreat? Bog off, you boring freak Peter Grant The new Jamie Cullum, mark our words Suri Cruise Born to a father who jumps on sofas and eats placentas. Girlfriend, we look forward to your teenage rebellion
